snippet.title: Spine & Quill Trailer
snippet.description:
Take up spine and quill in defense of your homeland of New Rodentia! Control the fight with a unique physics based combat system that spotlights the spear. Follow the story of Quillary and Itsy on their quest, battle robots, bugs, and more in this indie action game.

Steam page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2929770/Spine__Quill/

Join the discord:
https://discord.com/invite/BPAtSEmhGy

Trailer music by mistakeboi
https://mistakeboi.bandcamp.com/

End screen by Marina Otegui
https://marinaot.carrd.co/
